PHRASE.LANG: kName
Flower-blooming Powder of the Old Man
Cendres du vieil Hanasaka
Asche des Hanasaka-Greises
Ceneri del signor Hanasaka
Cenizas del viejo Hanasaka
花咲か爺さんがまいた灰
하나사카 할아버지가 뿌린 재
Flower-blooming Powder of the Old Man
開花爺爺的開花粉
開花爺爺的開花粉
Flower-blooming Powder of the Old Man
kDesc
It is said that if you scatter these ashes onto a withered tree, the tree will be in full bloom with cherry blossoms.[#Legal]
Cendres qui, paraît-il, permettent à un cerisier desséché de fleurir à nouveau.[#Legal]
Asche, welche einen vertrockneten Kirschblütenbaum wieder zum Erblühen bringen können soll.[#Legal]
Si dice che queste ceneri possano far fiorire nuovamente un ciliegio secco. [#Legal]
Cenizas que hacen florecer a los cerezos de nuevo.[#Legal]
枯れ木にまくと満開の桜が咲き誇ると伝わる灰。[#Legal]
말라붙은 나무에 뿌리면 벚꽃이 만개한다고 전해지는 재.[#Legal]
It is said that if you scatter these ashes onto a withered tree, the tree will be in full bloom with cherry blossoms.[#Legal]
據說只要將這些灰撒落枯萎了的樹，便會開遍櫻花。[#Legal]
據說只要將這些灰撒落枯萎了的樹，便會開遍櫻花。[#Legal]
It is said that if you scatter these ashes onto a withered tree, the tree will be in full bloom with cherry blossoms.[#Legal]
